summary: A 400-foot (122-meter) dinosaur-like beast, awoken from undersea hibernation off the Japanese coast by atomic-bomb testing, attacks Tokyo.
cast: Raymond Burr|Takashi Shimura|Momoko Kôchi|Akira Takarada|Akihiko Hirata|Sachio Sakai|Fuyuki Murakami|Ren Yamamoto|Toyoaki Suzuki|Tadashi Okabe|Toranosuke Ogawa|Frank Iwanaga|Mikel Conrad|Paul Frees|Fuji|Hiroshi Hayashi|James Hong|Ren Imaizumi|Shigeo Katô|Akio Kusama|Kokuten Kôdô|Tsuruko Mano|Lee Miller|Teruko Mita|Haruo Nakajima|Takeo Oikawa|Kenji Sahara|Kin Sugai|Ryosaku Takasugi|Katsumi Tezuka|Sammee Tong
keywords: animal character name as title|psychotronic film|disfigurement|godzilla|japan
director: Directors: Ishirô Honda (as Ishiro Honda), Terry O. Morse (as Terry Morse)
title: Godzilla: King of the Monsters!
